## RenderedConnection.targetBlock() method

Returns the block that this connection connects to.  The connected block or null if none is connected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
targetBlock(): BlockSvg | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) \| null
